stdlib-auth.name: stdlib-auth
stdlib-auth.description: Authentication and authorization standard library for ISL - login, logout, sessions, MFA, OAuth

stdlib-payments.name: stdlib-payments
stdlib-payments.description: Payment processing standard library - charges, refunds, subscriptions, invoices

stdlib-rest-api.name: stdlib-rest-api
stdlib-rest-api.description: REST API standard library - CRUD operations, pagination, filtering, versioning
